name: weeno
short_description: Weeno is an software-only extension of Wiring / Arduino for potentially all and any Atmel AVR MCUs. And potentially all chip architectures from all companies, whether Freescale, SiLabs, TI, even ARM. Basically, the goal is to make AVR-Weeno, ARM-Weeno, 8
